Index.title: Your MBTI test.
Index.label: Who are you?
Index.modalDesc: This may take a whole life to finish this test. So be prepared for the worst! Are you ready?

Report.title: Magical things happening...
Report.disclaimer: Remember, MBTI tests are just for fun! They can give you some ideas, but everyone is unique and complex. Don't take your results too seriously!
Report.description: From what I hear you are,
Report.advice: This may help you in a way,
Report.modalDesc: You sure want to delete your result? What is lost is lost, and gone for good.
